title: Getting Started With Investments Ft. Amanda Holden
description:
This week, Berna dives into a topic we can really use some simple, clear info on: Investing. She’s joined by Amanda Holden, aka Dumpster Doggy, to breakdown all the seemingly impossible to understand terms that surround investing, and how you can easily approach the them without having an MBA. They also talk about the concept of ethical investing, and how you can participate in the stock market without feeling like you’re selling your soul to Wall Street. We close out the show with the Public Forum, brought to you by Public.com, featuring listener-submitted questions all about investing. Be sure to follow us @whenshappyhr to send in your questions to be answered on the Public Forum!
Thanks to our presenting sponsor Public.com! Visit public.com/betches to sign up and get started today.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
